input.sentences: she went to her friend 's party to drink some more .
beifong 's friend was the most intoxicated .
she got everyone else equally drunk .
some of her friends had to hide from her .
output.sentences: College students today, just like those in my die like to go out on the weekend for a drink.
They meet up with their friends a the local watering hole and before you know it, there's a party.
Friends look out for one another so that no one drinks to the point of endangerment.
Sometime, however, friends end up equally drunk.
In the end, friends enjoy being together and sobering up a bit so they can go home.
